author: CT Phipps
description:
Mad Max: Fury Road is a movie that doesn’t need any promotion. It’s widely considered one of the best movies of the 21st century, and with good reason. I’m a huge post-apocalypse fan. I’m not a fan of “realistic” apocalypse stories, but I do love stories where it transforms the world into a pseudo-Wild West […]

The post REVIEW: Mad Max: Fury Road appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Mad Max: Fury Road
